backend/main.mo: Main backend canister managing articles, user profiles, newsletter subscriptions, and access‑controlled queries with seeded demo content.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading stored data to include access control state and user profiles while preserving existing article and newsletter maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to file paths, components, and test IDs with confidence scores.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React app configuring routing, theme provider, direct auth provider, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/articles/Article: Card component rendering article image, metadata, summary, and a read‑more button.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthCard.ts: Simple wrapper card component used for authentication UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthModal.t: Modal providing login and signup forms with mode switching.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginForm.t: Login form that submits email/password to the direct auth context with validation and navigation on success.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAnon: Conditional wrapper that renders children only when the user is not authenticated.
Signup form handling user input, validation, and account creation before redirecting home.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesS: Displays article categories as tabs and loads top articles per category.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with CTAs that open auth modal or navigate based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/home/InlineSignu: Inline signup card for new users with validation and redirect after successful signup.
frontend/src/components/home/TopStoriesS: Fetches and displays latest top stories with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with links, contact info, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation, auth controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapping content with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/NavLi: Custom navigation link with active state styling.
frontend/src/components/news/FeaturedNew: Loads and displays the main featured news article with image and metadata.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsSidebar: Sidebar showing signup prompt, popular articles, recent comments, and an auth modal for anonymous users.
frontend/src/components/news/PaginatedNe: Displays articles with pagination, fetching pages via a query and showing skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/newsletter/Newsl: Newsletter signup form with email validation, subscription mutation, and success/error toasts.
Provides simple direct auth context with localStorage session restore and mock signup/login/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches backend actors based on identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth client, identity loading, login flow, and context exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching articles, paginated data, categories, and handling newsletter subscriptions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining color tokens, dark mode values, fonts, and utility classes including gold accents.
frontend/src/lib/articles.ts: Helpers to format article dates and sort articles by creation time.
frontend/src/lib/auth.ts: Utility functions for formatting principals, checking authentication, and deriving display names.
frontend/src/lib/pagination.ts: Simple helpers to compute pagination offsets and total pages.
frontend/src/lib/sessionFlags.ts: SessionStorage helpers for tracking whether the auth modal has been shown.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates email format using a basic regex.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with mission, vision, and team information inside styled card components.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Provides a login/signup page that switches between LoginForm and SignupForm inside an AuthCard.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page composed of hero, signup, top stories, categories, and newsletter sections.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows the Latest News page with a featured section, paginated list, and sidebar layout.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Contains the Privacy Policy content using card sections for cookies, data protection, and third‑party links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, design specs, and existing features for the Daily News site.
